### Changed
- prometheus-operator will not check promql syntax for prometheusRules that are labelled `observability.giantswarm.io/rule-type: logs`
- Upgrade `alloy` to chart 0.9.0.
  - Bumps `alloy` from to 1.5.1 to 1.7.1
